paper_abstract: One of the Important functions of a network management system (NMS) is performance management (PM) PM deals with collecting statistical Information to track the effectiveness and utilization of the. network and network elements (NE) While this may be clone offline, it is often necessary to monitor the network statistics online in real time The aim of real-time monitoring is to achieve high accuracy of the statistics while minimizing, the use of scarce network bandwidth The accuracy objective call vary depending oil the priority and dynamic severity state of the NE We define cost, which needs to be optimized, as a function of network traffic and achieved accuracy Based oil the cost, a comparison Of push and pull data collection alternatives is clone We have developed a push-based distributed data collection system that Wiles the accuracy objectives, based oil the network traffic and the dynamic severity state of the NE Copyright (C) 2009 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd
paper_title: Distributed control of performance management traffic with accuracy objectives
